.icl-Skeleton.is-animating&gt;.icl-Skeleton-background{background-size:100%}[dir=ltr] .icl-Skeleton.is-animating&gt;.icl-Skeleton-background{left:0;-webkit-animation:icl-Skeleton-wave-ltr 2s infinite;-webkit-animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.645,.045,.355,1);animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.645,.045,.355,1);background-image:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,hsla(0,0%,100%,0),hsla(0,0%,100%,.35) 75%,hsla(0,0%,100%,0))}[dir=rtl] .icl-Skeleton.is-animating&gt;.icl-Skeleton-background{right:0;-webkit-animation:icl-Skeleton-wave-rtl 2s infinite;animation:icl-Skeleton-wave-rtl 2s 75%,hsla(0,0%,100%,0))}@media (prefers-reduced-motion:reduce){[dir=ltr] .icl-Skeleton.is-animating&gt;.icl-Skeleton-background,[dir=rtl]
